data.lyric:
[ti:Burn Out]
[ar:Midland]
[al:On The Rocks]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Burn Out - Midland
[00:00.29]Written by：Jess Carson/Cameron Duddy/Mark Wystrach/Shane McAnally/Josh Osborne
[00:00.58]Watching cigarettes burn out
[00:03.77]
[00:05.08]Till all the neon gets turned out
[00:08.52]
[00:09.79]I was so on fire for you it hurts how
[00:13.64]
[00:14.85]Fast a cigarette can burn out
[00:18.21]
[00:21.23]Just watching rivers run
[00:23.46]Down the side of my bottle
[00:25.27]
[00:25.95]It's almost like its crying my tears
[00:29.12]
[00:30.66]I had the world on a string and then I lost everything
[00:34.84]
[00:35.43]And that's how I wound up here
[00:39.00]Watching cigarettes burn out
[00:42.09]
[00:43.43]Till all the neon gets turned out
[00:46.87]
[00:48.37]There's nothing left but empty glasses now
[00:51.89]It's all flashes now
[00:53.87]
[00:55.58]A smoking memory that ain't nothing but ashes
[00:59.43]In the low lights
[01:01.31]
[01:02.71]These done me wrong songs hit me so right
[01:06.08]
[01:07.56]I'm so on fire for you it hurts how
[01:11.18]
[01:12.53]Fast a cigarette can burn out
[01:15.64]
[01:18.30]If you put your hands on the flame
[01:20.75]You got no right to complain
[01:22.77]
[01:23.37]Cause you know it's gonna leave a mark
[01:26.68]
[01:28.11]When the glow comes to an end
[01:30.15]Like scattered embers in the wind
[01:32.74]Leaves you looking for a brand new spark
[01:36.41]Watching cigarettes burn out
[01:39.75]
[01:51.04]Now with every hit
[01:53.06]
[01:53.65]I'm gonna quit
[01:55.32]
[01:55.93]But who am I kidding
[01:58.34]I just can't put you down
[02:00.42]So I keep hanging around
[02:04.39]
[02:05.09]Watching cigarettes burn out
[02:08.53]
[02:09.92]Till all the neon gets turned out
[02:13.25]
[02:14.76]There's nothing left but empty glasses now
[02:18.32]It's all flashes now
[02:20.32]
[02:21.99]A smoking memory that ain't nothing but ashes
[02:25.71]In the low lights
[02:27.73]
[02:29.03]These done me wrong songs hit me so right
[02:32.55]
[02:33.75]I'm so on fire for you it hurts how
[02:37.74]
[02:38.85]Fast a cigarette can burn out
[02:42.16]
[02:43.42]I was so on fire for you it hurts how
[02:47.27]
[02:48.44]Fast a cigarette can burn out
